idea:
WINGRS is a creative branding agency that is fueled by the philosophy of reinvention. In the digital space, we make brands appear spontaneous, refreshing and relevant no matter how the market shifts and trends change. As a young firm, we are indulgent of youthful ideas that are paired with powerful research, keen observation and impactful strategic execution. 


If you love design, you’ll love us. We design brands – both aesthetically and conceptually, by creating pathways to digital amplification. Trendsetting content, dynamic image-building concepts, bespoke communication are just some of our favourite ways to enhance the ethos of brands that fly with it. 


We value the fundamental purpose of your brand, and the core aspects of business relations that go with it when you partner with us. How? We believe in providing powerful brand analysis, focusing on pain points and equipping ourselves with the best technologies to amplify your digital presence. With the right mixes of digital marketing techniques, we’re wired to achieve high-performance and result-oriented solutions for brands that are willing to take the leap. 


For times when things go south, we’re good with crisis management too. Being able to ‘put out the proverbial fire’ is why people call us in the first place.Website


So, are you ready to #WingIt?
name: Wingrs Creative House

idea: Copper Cocoa based out in Nahur East is a Homemade Bakery products business started by Chef Amey Padwal in Year 2020. Copper Cocoa has expertise in making customized Cakes at an affordable price which are rich in taste & flavors. Cakes, Chocolates, cookies delivered straight to their home across Mumbai, Thane city and Navi Mumbai. We launch exciting hampers on various festive seasons. Copper Cocoa is deeply committed to hygiene practices & maintain superior quality of bakery items. *Order should be placed one day prior. Delivery Charges will be applicable as per your location.* Experience the taste atleast once of Copper Cocoa products. Please Note - We are FSSAI and UDYAM Government certified.
name: Copper Cocoa
